enemies.name: Gelatinous Cube
enemies.intro_alive: A jelly-like cube wants to encompass you!
enemies.intro_dead: Now the jelly is just a bunch of wet goo.
enemies.look_dead: Of him remaains only a bunch of slime.
enemies.talk_dead: A dead cube has nothing to say.

enemies.name: Ravenous Squirrel
enemies.intro_alive: An angry squirrel wants to bite your carotid artery!
enemies.intro_dead: You defeated a squirrel! That's something to be proud of.
